install.name: JEZ Arguo
install.author: JoomlaEZ.com
install.description: JEZ Arguo - Fully Customization, Smooth Effect Joomla Slideshow Module.

params.param:
Joomla slideshow module JEZ Arguo is a module developed to display fading news / messages that pauses between each others with nice transition effects.

JEZ Arguo has 2 difference editions: free and PRO. These 2 editions share almost same key features. The free edition is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0 Unported license and is valid for use on personal non-commercial website only. The PRO edition is Commercial Proprietary and is valid for use on any kind of websites.

Please visit JoomlaEZ.com for full features list, editions comparison, licenses comparison, getting started guide, documentation and get support on using / implementing JEZ Arguo.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached

params.param:
Retrieve content created with Joomla's default content component.

In Joomla administration panel, go to Content -> Article Manager to find article IDs. Separate multiple articles with '|' character.

param.name: content_sections
param.label: Sections
param.description: Query for articles belonging to selected section(s)

param.name: content_categories
param.label: Categories
param.description: Query for articles belonging to selected categor(y/ies)

param.name: content_articles
param.label: Article IDs
param.description: Query for articles which IDs speficied here. Separate multiple articles with '|' character.

param.name: content_allconds
param.label: Meet All Conditions
param.description: Only query for articles which meet all conditions specified above

param.name: content_ordering
param.label: Articles Ordering
param.description: How to order queried articles?

param.name: content_limit
param.label: Limitation
param.description: Limit articles retrieval to the number specified here. Input 0 to disable limitation.

param.name: content_unpublished
param.label: Show Unpublished
param.description: Query for unpublished articles also

param.name: content_archived
param.label: Show Archieved
param.description: Query for archieved item also

param.name: content_frontpage
param.label: Frontpage Only
param.description: Query for articles assigned to show in frontpage only

params.param:
Retrieve content managed with Joomla's default newsfeeds component.

In Joomla administration panel, go to Components -> News Feeds -> Feeds to find newsfeed ID. Separate multiple newsfeeds with '|' character.

param.name: newsfeeds
param.label: Newsfeed IDs
param.description: Get content from newsfeeds which IDs speficied here. Separate multiple newsfeeds with '|' character.

param.name: newsfeeds_limit
param.label: Limitation
param.description: Limit articles retrieval via newsfeed to the number specified here. Input 0 to disable limitation.

param.name: newsfeeds_unpublished
param.label: Query Unpublished
param.description: Get content from unpublished newsfeeds also

params.param:
Render specified modules and use as content for slideshow.

In Joomla administration panel, go to Extensions -> Module Manager to find module ID. Separate multiple modules with '|' character.

param.name: modules
param.label: Module IDs
param.description: Use modules which IDs speficied here as content for slideshow. Separate multiple modules with '|' character.

param.name: modules_ordering
param.label: Modules Ordering
param.description: How to order queried modules?

param.name: modules_unpublished
param.label: Render Unpublished
param.description: Render unpublished modules also

param.name: modules_title
param.label: Show Title
param.description: Show module title?

params.param:
Retrieve content created with K2 content construction kit extension.

In Joomla administration panel, go to Components -> K2 -> Items to find K2 item IDs. Separate multiple K2 items with '|' character.

param.name: k2_cats
param.label: K2 Categories
param.description: Query for items belonging to selected K2 categor(y/ies)

param.name: k2_tags
param.label: K2 Tags
param.description: Query for items assigned selected K2 tag(s)

param.name: k2_items
param.label: K2 Item IDs
param.description: Query for K2 items which IDs speficied here. Separate multiple K2 items with '|' character.

param.name: k2_allconds
param.label: Meet All Conditions
param.description: Only query for K2 items which meet all conditions specified above

param.name: k2_ordering
param.label: K2 Items Ordering
param.description: How to order queried K2 items?

param.name: k2_limit
param.label: Limitation
param.description: Limit K2 items retrieval to the number specified here. Input 0 to disable limitation.

param.name: k2_nested
param.label: Nested Categories
param.description: Also query for items belonging to nested categor(y/ies) of selected K2 categor(y/ies) above

param.name: k2_unpublished
param.label: Show Unpublished
param.description: Query for unpublished K2 items also

param.name: k2_featured
param.label: Featured Only
param.description: Query for featured K2 items only

params.param:
Get data from specified XML document then use as content for slideshow.

Input either the relative path from Joomla root directory to internal XML document or the full URL to external XML document.

param.name: xml_utf8
param.label: UTF-8 Encoded XML
param.description: Is the specified XML document UTF-8 encoded?

param.name: xml_limit
param.label: Limitation
param.description: Limit data entries retrieval to the number specified here. Input 0 to disable limitation.

param.name: xml_itemNode
param.label: Items Node
param.description: Specify the node name (XML tag) to parse for content items here

param.name: xml_titleNode
param.label: Title Node
param.description: Specify the node name (XML tag) for individual item's title here

param.name: xml_contentNode
param.label: Content Node
param.description: Specify the node name (XML tag) for individual item's content here

param.name: xml_linkNode
param.label: Link Node
param.description: Specify the node name (XML tag) for individual item's associated link here

param.name: words
param.label: Words Count
param.description: Limit content of each slide to the number of words specified here. Input 0 for no limitation.

param.name: image
param.label: Show Image?
param.description: Display image embeded in slide content?

param.name: item_title
param.label: Show Title?
param.description: Show slide title? Does not affect modules.

param.name: title_tag
param.label: Title Format
param.description: Markup tag to be used for slide title

param.name: link_title
param.label: Linked Title
param.description: Make the slide title linkable if has associated link? Does not affect modules.

param.name: intro_only
param.label: Intro Only
param.description: Show only the intro text of retrieved content? Does not affect modules and content retrieved from newsfeeds, XML document.

param.name: readmore
param.label: Read More
param.description: Show 'Read more' if has associated link? Does not affect modules.

param.name: @title
param.label: Initialization Settings
param.description:
Choose an event to initialize the slideshow:

  • onDomReady

    Recommended for text-only slideshow.

  • onLoad

    Recommended for slideshow with image embeded in slideshow item.

param.name: instanceID
param.label: Instance ID
param.description: If you plan to use more than one instance of this module, enter an unique ID for this instance here

param.name: navigableBrowsing
param.label: Navigable Browsing
param.description: Add support for browser backward and forward buttons so, if slideshow item has been switched (by timed slideshow or user interaction) users can always use their browser's backward and forward buttons to navigate already viewed slideshow items. This is done by: 1. Create unique URL segment (#) link for each item index. This will allow users bookmark individual slideshow item. 2. Update browser's address bar when following control buttons is clicked: backward, fast backward, forward, fast forward.

param.name: enableShuffle
param.label: Enable shuffle mode
param.description: Play slideshow in random order?

param.name: timed
param.label: Timed slideshow
param.description: Show next item automatically after certain time pass

param.name: delay
param.label: Delay time
param.description: Show next item automatically after the time defined here pass

param.name: autoStop
param.label: Stop automatically
param.description: If enabled will stop timed slideshow automatically on user activity such as manually change to previous/next/certain item or act on form embeded in a content item

param.name: @desc
param.label: Control Buttons
param.description: You can show/hide any slideshow control button. Control panel will be disabled automatically if all control buttons is set to hide.

param.name: showPlay
param.label: Show play/pause button
param.description: Show play/pause button to play/stop slideshow

param.name: showBackward
param.label: Show backward button
param.description: Display button to show previous slideshow item with transition effect

param.name: showFastBackward
param.label: Show fast backward button
param.description: Display button to show previous slideshow item without transition effect

param.name: showForward
param.label: Show forward button
param.description: Display button to show next slideshow item with transition effect

param.name: showFastForward
param.label: Show fast forward button
param.description: Display button to show next slideshow item without transition effect

param.name: @desc
param.label: Layout
param.description: Set orientation, position and alignment for slideshow control buttons.

param.name: controlOrientation
param.label: Control buttons orientation
param.description: Display control buttons horizontally or vertically?

param.name: controlPosHoriz
param.label: Horizontal buttons position
param.description: Place horizontal buttons at top or bottom edge?

param.name: controlAlignHoriz
param.label: Horizontal buttons alignment
param.description: Align the horizontal buttons to left, center or right?

param.name: controlPosVert
param.label: Vertical buttons position
param.description: Place vertical buttons at left or right edge?

param.name: controlAlignVert
param.label: Vertical buttons alignment
param.description: Align the vertical buttons to top, middle or bottom?

param.name: showIndex
param.label: Show index
param.description: Display items indexes

param.name: indexesType
param.label: Indexes Type
param.description: Use numeric, item title or mix of numeric and item title for indexes?

param.name: jTips
param.label: Use Joomla! Tips
param.description: If indexes type is numeric, use Joomla's tool-tips script to display slideshow item title when mouse-over its index

param.name: @desc
param.label: Layout
param.description: Set orientation, position and alignment for slideshow items indexes.

param.name: indexControlRel
param.label: Index panel relation
param.description: If index panel is placed in same edge with control panel, place it before/above or after/below control panel?

param.name: indexesOrientation
param.label: Indexes orientation
param.description: Display indexes of all items horizontally or vertically?

param.name: indexPosHoriz
param.label: Horizontal indexes position
param.description: Place horizontal indexes at top or bottom edge?

param.name: indexAlignHoriz
param.label: Horizontal indexes alignment
param.description: Align the horizontal indexes to left, center or right?

param.name: indexPosVert
param.label: Vertical indexes position
param.description: Place vertical indexes at left or right edge?

param.name: indexAlignVert
param.label: Vertical indexes alignment
param.description: Align the vertical indexes to top, middle or bottom?

param.name: @desc
param.label: Scrolling
param.description: If there are too many items indexes and scrolling needed to surf from beginning to ending of them, display scrolling buttons or not? If scrolling buttons is disabled, scrolling will be triggered when visitor/user moves his/her mouse to left/top or right/bottom edges of index panel.

param.name: reverseScroll
param.label: Reverse scroll
param.description: If enabled will automatically scroll to ending if reach beginning of items indexes and vice versa. Only effective when scrolling buttons is enabled

param.name: fxDuration
param.label: Effect duration
param.description: Duration, in miliseconds, for every effect to complete

param.name: transitionFx
param.label: Transition effect
param.description: Transition effect used to switch from one item to another
